english_descriptive: a particle used to express emotions like surprise, exclamation, or agreement
used to refer politely to a woman of your parents’ generation
example_pinyin: Āyí, wǒ lái bāng nín ná dōngxi.
example_en: Auntie, I’ll help you carry the things.

english_descriptive: having less than average height
example_en: He is a little shorter than me.

english_descriptive: an activity a person enjoys doing in their free time
free from noise; calm and serene
used to indicate a handful of something or a certain object with a handle
example_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yì bǎ yǐzi.

english_descriptive: a group of students taught together or a team/group of people
example_pinyin: Wǒmen bān yǒu èrshí gè xuésheng.

english_descriptive: to relocate objects or oneself from one place to another
a way to solve a problem or accomplish a task
example_cn: 这个问题没有办法解决。
example_en: There’s no way to solve this problem.

english_descriptive: a room or building where people work
example_en: The teacher works in the office.

english_descriptive: one of two equal parts; fifty percent of something
example_pinyin: Wǒ chī le yí bàn de dàngāo.
example_en: I ate half of the cake.

english_descriptive: to assist someone in doing something
example_pinyin: Qǐng nǐ bāngmáng bān yíxià zhuōzi.

english_descriptive: a container to carry items; or the action of wrapping
example_pinyin: Tā bēi zhe yí gè bāo.

english_descriptive: the northern part of a country or region
example_en: The winters in the north are very cold.

english_descriptive: used to indicate that the subject is acted upon
example_pinyin: Wǒ de shǒujī bèi tā ná zǒu le.
example_en: My phone was taken by him.

english_descriptive: the part of the face used for breathing and smelling
example_pinyin: Tā yǒu yí gè dà bízi.

english_descriptive: to evaluate differences or similarities between things
example_pinyin: Zhège píngguǒ bǐ nà gè dà.
example_en: This apple is bigger than that one.

english_descriptive: used to indicate a comparison or relative degree
an event where people compete to win
example_en: He participated in the soccer competition.

english_descriptive: a book used for writing notes
example_cn: 我买了一个新的笔记本。
example_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yí gè xīn de bǐjìběn.

english_descriptive: used to indicate necessity or obligation
a difference or transformation in condition or situation
example_pinyin: Tiānqì yǒu le hěn dà biànhuà.
example_en: The weather has changed a lot.

english_descriptive: people other than oneself
example_en: Don’t worry about other people’s business.

english_descriptive: an appliance used to keep food cold
example_pinyin: Bīngxiāng lǐ yǒu hěn duō shuǐguǒ.
example_en: There are a lot of fruits in the refrigerator.

english_descriptive: used to indicate that something is true in addition to something else
example_cn: 他不但会唱歌，而且会跳舞。
example_pinyin: Tā búdàn huì chànggē, érqiě huì tiàowǔ.
example_en: He can not only sing, but also dance.

english_descriptive: used to add extra information, similar to 'and also'
example_pinyin: Tā hěn cōngming, érqiě hěn nǔlì.
example_en: She is smart, and also very hardworking.

english_descriptive: a list of food or drink options available at a restaurant
example_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yí fèn càidān.

english_descriptive: to take part in an event or activity
example_en: I will participate in the meeting tomorrow.

english_descriptive: green plants that cover the ground in fields or yards
example_pinyin: Gōngyuán lǐ yǒu hěn duō cǎo.
example_en: There is a lot of grass in the park.

english_descriptive: used for counting floors of a building or layers of something
example_en: I live on the third floor.

english_descriptive: a large store selling food and household goods
example_en: I’m going to the supermarket to buy things.

english_descriptive: a piece of clothing worn on the upper body
example_pinyin: Tā chuān le yí jiàn bái chènshān.
example_en: He is wearing a white shirt.

english_descriptive: the outcome or score achieved in a test or task
example_pinyin: Wǒ de kǎoshì chéngjì hěn hǎo.
example_en: My exam result is very good.

english_descriptive: a large town or urban area
example_pinyin: Běijīng shì yí gè dà chéngshì.

english_descriptive: to arrive after the scheduled time
example_pinyin: Tā jīntiān yòu chídào le yí cì.

english_descriptive: used to indicate exclusion or addition
example_pinyin: Chúle wǒ, dàjiā dōu qù le.

english_descriptive: a vessel for traveling on water
example_pinyin: Wǒmen zuò chuán qù dǎo shàng.
example_en: We took a boat to the island.

english_descriptive: the season between winter and summer
a book that lists words and their meanings
example_en: I look up new words in the dictionary.

english_descriptive: having good intelligence or quick understanding
example_pinyin: Tā hěn cōngming, xuéxí hěn kuài.
example_en: He is smart and learns quickly.

english_descriptive: to make a place tidy or free of dirt
example_en: I clean my room every day.

english_descriptive: to intend or make arrangements for something
example_en: I plan to go swimming tomorrow.

english_descriptive: to carry something with you
to feel anxious or concerned about something
example_pinyin: Bùyào dānxīn, yíqiè huì hǎo de.
example_en: Don’t worry, everything will be fine.

english_descriptive: a sweet baked dessert
example_en: I like to eat chocolate cake.

english_descriptive: used to emphasize certainty or agreement
used to connect an adjective or verb to modify another verb
a device that produces light
example_pinyin: Fángjiān lǐ de dēng hěn liàng.
example_en: The light in the room is very bright.

english_descriptive: a location or area
example_cn: 这里是一个安静的地方。
example_pinyin: Zhèlǐ shì yí gè ānjìng de dìfang.

english_descriptive: an underground urban train system
example_en: I take the subway to work every day.

english_descriptive: a representation of an area showing geographic features
a platform or compartment that moves people or goods up and down in a building
an electronic message sent over the internet
example_pinyin: Wǒ fā le yì fēng diànzǐ yóujiàn.

english_descriptive: the cardinal direction opposite to west
example_en: The sun rises in the east.

english_descriptive: the coldest season of the year, after autumn and before spring
a living creature that is not a human or plant
example_pinyin: Dòngwùyuán lǐ yǒu hěn duō dòngwù.
example_en: There are many animals in the zoo.

english_descriptive: having little length or duration
example_pinyin: Zhè tiáo kùzi tài duǎn le.

english_descriptive: a part of a larger whole, often a portion of time or space
example_pinyin: Wǒ dú le yí duàn gùshi.
example_en: I read a section of the story.

english_descriptive: to perform physical activities to stay healthy
example_cn: 每天早上我都锻炼身体。
example_pinyin: Měitiān zǎoshang wǒ dōu duànliàn shēntǐ.

english_descriptive: used to emphasize the degree of a quality
feeling the need for food
example_pinyin: Wǒ hěn è, yào chīfàn le.
example_en: I’m very hungry, it’s time to eat.

english_descriptive: the organ used for hearing
to deliver or distribute something
example_pinyin: Wǒ fā le yì tiáo xiāoxi.

english_descriptive: to experience an elevated body temperature due to illness
to find or realize something new
example_pinyin: Wǒ fāxiàn le yì běn hǎo shū.

english_descriptive: easy to use or access; not causing difficulty
to place something somewhere
example_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ shū fàng zài zhuōzi shàng.
example_en: Please put the book on the table.

english_descriptive: to feel relieved and not worry
example_cn: 你可以放心，我会照顾好他。
example_pinyin: Nǐ kěyǐ fàngxīn, wǒ huì zhàogù hǎo tā.
example_en: You can rest assured, I will take care of him.

english_descriptive: used to indicate time in minutes or to separate something into parts
example_pinyin: Xiànzài shì sān diǎn shí fēn.

english_descriptive: the area close to a location
example_pinyin: Wǒ jiā fùjìn yǒu yí gè chāoshì.
example_en: There is a supermarket near my house.

english_descriptive: to go over previously learned material
example_pinyin: Kǎoshì qián wǒ yào fùxí yǔfǎ.
example_en: I need to review grammar before the exam.

english_descriptive: free from dirt or impurities
to become ill with cold symptoms
example_en: He caught a cold and needs to rest.

english_descriptive: to have curiosity or enthusiasm for something
a short time ago
the physical stature or build of a person
used to indicate basis or source for information or action
example_cn: 根据天气预报，明天会下雨。
example_pinyin: Gēnjù tiānqì yùbào, míngtiān huì xià yǔ.
example_en: According to the weather forecast, it will rain tomorrow.

english_descriptive: to accompany someone or follow instructions
example_pinyin: Wǒ gēn tā yìqǐ qù xuéxiào.
example_en: I’m going to school with him.

english_descriptive: used to indicate a higher degree than before
a public green space for recreation
example_en: We are going to the park for a walk.

english_descriptive: a narrative about events or experiences
example_cn: 爷爷给我讲了一个故事。
example_pinyin: Yéye gěi wǒ jiǎng le yí gè gùshi.

english_descriptive: used to describe when the wind is blowing strongly
to shut something such as a door, window, or device
the connection or association between people or things
example_pinyin: Tāmen yǒu hěn hǎo de guānxi.
example_en: They have a very good relationship.

english_descriptive: to show concern or interest in someone or something
example_cn: 父母很关心孩子的学习。
example_pinyin: Fùmǔ hěn guānxīn háizi de xuéxí.
example_en: Parents care a lot about their children's studies.

english_descriptive: used to indicate the topic of something
a nation with its own government, territory, and population
example_pinyin: Zhōngguó shì yí gè dà guójiā.

english_descriptive: used to indicate past experiences or the act of passing time
used to ask a choice between two or more options
example_pinyin: Nǐ xiǎng hē chá háishi kāfēi?
example_en: Do you want tea or coffee?

english_descriptive: to feel fear or worry about something
example_en: He is afraid of the dark.

english_descriptive: a board for writing on with chalk, typically in classrooms
example_en: The teacher writes on the blackboard.

english_descriptive: an official document for international travel identifying the holder
a plant with colorful petals; also to use resources on something
example_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yí shù huā.
example_en: I bought a bouquet of flowers.

english_descriptive: to produce pictures using pen, pencil, or brush
not good or functioning poorly
to greet or receive someone with pleasure
the surroundings or conditions in which a person, animal, or plant lives or operates
to replace or switch something with another
example_pinyin: Wǒ huàn le yí jiàn xīn yīfu.

english_descriptive: the second longest river in China, known as the cradle of Chinese civilization
example_pinyin: Huáng Hé liú jīng hěn duō shěngfèn.
example_en: The Yellow River flows through many provinces.

english_descriptive: a gathering of people to discuss topics or make decisions
example_pinyin: Wǒmen xiàwǔ yǒu yí gè huìyì.
example_en: We have a meeting this afternoon.

english_descriptive: the impact, purpose, or role of something
example_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng yào de zuòyòng hěn dà.
example_en: This medicine has a strong effect.

english_descriptive: referring to a time or events that have already happened
example_cn: 过去的事情不要再想了。
example_pinyin: Guòqù de shìqíng bú yào zài xiǎng le.
example_en: Don’t think about past events anymore.

english_descriptive: used to indicate continuation or addition
to respond to a question or message
feeling worried or needing immediate attention
example_pinyin: Tā hěn jí, yào qù yīyuàn.
example_en: He is anxious and needs to go to the hospital.

english_descriptive: to give instruction or impart knowledge
depending on context, either to formally teach or to indicate a name
example_cn: 他叫李明，老师教我们数学。
example_pinyin: Tā jiào Lǐ Míng, lǎoshī jiào wǒmen shùxué.
example_en: He is called Li Ming; the teacher instructs us in math.

english_descriptive: a planned show or segment for entertainment or information
to gain knowledge or comprehension of something
example_en: I want to understand Chinese culture.

english_descriptive: a small, round fruit that grows in clusters on vines
indicates the beginning of an action or a change in state
example_pinyin: Wǒ zǎoshang liù diǎn qǐchuáng qǐlái.

english_descriptive: the study of numbers, shapes, and patterns
having the taste characteristic of sugar or honey
a regular practice or routine; to be accustomed to
example_en: I am used to getting up early.

english_descriptive: a portable container for packing personal belongings when traveling
example_pinyin: Wǒ yǒu yí gè dà xínglǐxiāng.

english_descriptive: the father of one's father
used to indicate something happens in most cases or normally
example_pinyin: Wǒ yìbān zǎoshang liù diǎn qǐchuáng.
example_en: I usually get up at 6 a.m.

english_descriptive: used to describe doing two actions simultaneously
example_cn: 我一边吃饭，一边看电视。
example_pinyin: Wǒ yìbiān chīfàn, yìbiān kàn diànshì.

english_descriptive: without interruption or change

english_concise: measure word for certain animals or one of a pair
english_descriptive: used to count animals or items that come in pairs
used to indicate exclusivity or condition
example_en: Only by working hard can one succeed.

example_cn: 根据天气预报，明天会下雨。
example_pinyin: Gēnjù tiānqì yùbào, míngtiān huì xià yǔ.
example_en: According to the weather forecast, it will rain tomorrow.

example_pinyin: Wǒ gēn tā yìqǐ qù xuéxiào.
example_en: I’m going to school with him.

example_cn: 爷爷给我讲了一个故事。
example_pinyin: Yéye gěi wǒ jiǎng le yí gè gùshi.

example_pinyin: Tāmen yǒu hěn hǎo de guānxi.
example_en: They have a very good relationship.

example_cn: 父母很关心孩子的学习。
